title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar in Build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, only the first match is not automatically selected.
OB: When double-clicking on the search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: When double-clicking on the search result, you should get 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Search for references to the specified field
3. Double-click on the search result
